Which wax is eco friendly

what is top selling candle
which candles are sold in bulk
which candlkes have higher price
Is candle making business set-up easy
Is candle making beginner friendly
responses: Supplies needed like wax, wicks, fragrance oils, dyes, containers, boilers, thermometer, holder
Materials can be found from online, craft store, local dealers

Basic Steps to Make Candles: 
1. Melt wax in steel bowl over boiling water 
2. Add dye/colour to melted wax and turn off heat 
3. Add fragrance to cool melted liquid wax 
4. Pour into container and add wick after 10 mins 
5. Let the wax solidify
Silicone reusable moulds can be used for making candles in batches
Flower moulds and shapes can be used for decorative candles
Candle made can be retailed through NGO, Local Handicraft Sales, Corporate Gifiting sales, Online Sales
Silicone moulds are more expensive compared to Aluminium moulds
For large batch of candle making, Aluminium moulds with 36Pc is available starting from price of 2000 INR
Online tutorial video available on youtube
Candles made should be stored in cool and dry area for longer shelf life and maintainence
Soy Wax, Praffin Wax, Gel Wax, Coconut Wax and Beeswax can be used for Candle making
Praffin Wax is cheapest and easy to work with while it can hold both fragnrance & colour
Soy Wax is mid range price but holds scents less
Coconut and Beeswax Wax have higher price but are eco friendly and hold scents well.
1kg of wax can make 20-25 standard size candle.
To maximize production and gains,  you can use smaller decorative shape moulds as smaller moulds would give larger number of  decorative candles that are priced higher
Candle making is profitable venture with average profit margin of 30-60% depending on different factors
To maximize profits bulk material purchase and optimised production is major factor
You can start with a basic investment of 5000 to upto 1Lakh depending on your business plan and production amount .
For manufacturing efficiency, various machines are availble in market producing 180-300 candles per hour with prices starting INR 20000 to 40000 with cooling feature
Top selling candles are : Jar Candles, Scented Candles, Tea Light candles
Mass produced candles are : Pillar candles  and Tapered candles
Candles priced higher are : Decorative Candles made from beeswax and Scented Candles
Candles Making is a scalable business and can be set-up easily from different workers home
It is customisable and simple to learn making it easy for beginner crafter and requires low upfront investment.

responses: Basic material - Canvas , sheet , colours, pencil
Type of colours - Acrylic Paint, Oil Paint,Watercolor, Gouache,Pastels,Ink,Emulsion Paint,Bitumious Paint
Traditional Painting Types - Realism, Potrait, landscape,Impressionism,post Impressionism
Texture painting is in trend now a days
Texture painting paste can be made of all putty, white cement,marble powder, Gypsum
Texture painting with wall pouty . Take 3 tablespoon powder add 2 tablespoon water and 1 spoon glue. After paste is consistent you can add acrylic colour of your choice .
Texture painting with Acrylic wall pouty paste  .Ratio for paste to glue is 10:1 and add acrylic colour 1 portion for smooth paste
Glue slows down drying process for paste and it doesnt affect consistency .
For arches - 3 portion glue for landscape one portion and for flowers 1 portion s
Type of arches - Corner, side, center, multiple arches.
For arches you can use paint scraper
For flowers texture painting knifes can be used
For potrait painting focus on accurate proportions and placement of features
For potrait painting Break down faces into planes to understand how light and shadow interact.
For potrait painting avoid harsh edges especially for eyes and mouth
Dont overwork details focus on capturinge essence.
Invest in quality tools and equipements
Determine pricing structure - hourly, per square foot. Ensure it covers costs and profits
For marketing make social presence by creating website or social media post to showcase your work
For marketing List your business on google business profile.

How to increase profits in pickle buisness

responses: Type: Mango, lemon, Chilli, Mixed, Garlic, Amla, etc, Oil used : Mustard Oil
Low Invetsment Business but requires licensing & FSSAI registration
It can be sold Offline & online
Sales Channels can be local grocery store, organic food store, food fair, farmer's market
For basic buisness set-up a kitchen for perparation  and storage along with 2-3 people as helpers needed
Based on Raw material Cost, Jars Packaging, Registration & Basic Ad, the initial capital of 8000-10000 INR needed
A pickle business can have 60%-80% Margin based on sale price and production price
Ideas for exotic pickle like jackfruit, banboo shoot have higher sales price
Most popular and mass market is for Mango, lemon , Chilli & Mixed
Traditional Spice Blends used in production is easy available in the market
Low set-up cost and higher shelf life makes this business easily scalable
Pickle receipe are common, most ingrideints are naturally fermented in Indian Spice Mix and Oil Base in glass jar, a batch takes 7-10 days to get pprepared and ready for sale.
You can use PET and glass jars but Best to use Sterilised glass Jars for storage
Use of Non Iodized salt gives more shelf life, thus having low wastage of ready batches
Use of Preservatives is optional based on Commercial Shelf life & Sales

There can be multiple variations created based on Key Ingredient, rest should be similar by fermenting the key ingredient and soaking in oil. There are variation based on health consious  low -oil based, etc

Business can be set-up in Phases based on funds & production capacity as: 
Phase 1- Home Based to Local Market (0-50 jars/month) --Initial Home Batch 
Phase 2- Local Reatil & Online Presence (50-500 jars/month) --Stable Semi Pro with Production Set-up 
Phase 3- Region Based Distribution & Wholesale (500-2000 jars/month) --Large Scale with commercial kitchens  
Phase 4- Brand Building & national presence (5000+ jars/month) -- Industrial Scale with Co-packer
Local Vegetable vendor or deal with farmer to procure fresh ingredient and low cost
Health Consicous low oil based pickle are selling in Urban market with 100-150% profit per jar at premium pricing
Bulk Sales and Tie -up with cloud kitchens, tiffin services, dhabas are also good sales point
Based on the sales, which pickle type is more popular that production can be increased
Most Rural areas have traditional pickles being made at home

responses: Low Capital business with repeat customer and can be started from home with 30-70% Profit margin
Rising Trends in Home & Kitchen Gardening, Asthetic decoration, eco-friendly gifting makes this a  business that can easily grow.
For set-up terrace, backyard or open area of home can be used or you can rent a plot
For Land set-up (50-200sq yard), partial shade and irrigation with drip pipe needed
You can sell Flowering Plants, Vegetable Plants, Indoor decoration Plants, Medicinal plants, Bonsai
You can also sell saplings, seeds, pots, planters, organic manure, cocopeat, etc.
Initial set-up cost around 25000 -30000 INR considering seeds, pots, grow bags, shade set-up & basic tools
Plants grown can be sold from Walk-In sales, local markets, apartments/societies, Weekend markets
For Online Sales,  Platforms like Ugaao, NurseryLive, MyBageecha (B2B or vendor), Whatsapp/Instagram can be used
Profit margin can vary based on plant production cost vs market where you are selling as Urban areas have higher price.
You can also have tie-ups with Landscapers & Builders for Use of plants in different decoration set-ups & gardening arrangements in Newly constructed housings , hotels, etc.
You can register at Udyam/MSME for subsidies & loans
Based on region and season, you can grow the plants and market them
Indoor Plants like Money Plants are most popular and fast growing
In Outdoor Plants- Hibiscus, Rose , Bougainvillea are most popular selling  with high bloom.
Medicinal and Low Maintenance Plants are Tulsi, Aloe vera, Cactus,Lucky Bamboo
Fengshui plants like Jade, Lucky Bamboo and Succulents are mostly sold as gifting items at high price
Fengshui plants like Jade, Lucky Bamboo and Succulents are mostly sold as gifting items at high price
Most profit plants are : Money Plant, Jade Plant, Spider Plant, AloeVera & Snake Plant
For an initial business set-up minimum 2 people needed for plant curation and care
Initially can start with a combination of Flower plants and Decoration Plants then based on area can increase the variety
